review: Not recommended to visit the doctor. I am disappointed from my experience. I wrote a review earlier within a few days of my visit as I was new. However my later experience was not good after 4 months of visit.
reply_text:
Thank you for your feedback, it‚Äôs our constant endeavour to improve our services and we take feedbacks very seriously.
We appreciate you writing to us and informing us that you were initially happy with our services and after a few visits your were dis-satisfied, we request you to kindly let us know a little more in details as to where you feel our services were lacking. Please feel free to call us and discuss or we would love to call and speak with you if you leave your number.

Thank you for visiting our clinic and look forward to hearing from you soon

Warm regards 
Dr Seema Sharma

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I was 26 weeks expecting, towards the end of September 2019, when I came to Delhi from Hyderabad. An accident, nearly 1.5 years old, resulted in cartilage rupture in both my knees that had not healed and was posing a challenge during this phase. Thus began my search for a gynaecologist in whom I could trust and find support towards the last phase of pregnancy especially when the injury was adding to the difficulty of the last phase along with other health issues. I came across Dr Sharma's profile and set an appointment during the first week of October. In the first meeting itself her expertise and warmth both became evident and gave me the confidence that I was in good hands. The check-ups accompanied by her guidance made it easier. The big decision regarding a normal or C-sec delivery was the big question that was due to be decided. Dr Sharma at all times gave me practical advice and told me about cases which would give me more clarity while taking my decision. At 36 weeks only (in the morning only when my baby was born), I had dialated 2.5 cm (the usual being 1 cm at that stage) and was told that the delivery could happen any minute. The same evening, I went into labour and now came the hour of decision. Keeping in mind factors like pressure on my knees, duration of my last stage of labour and the injury happening again due to the pressure, a decision for a C-sec was taken. Her smiling face and her motherly touch on the face right before undergoing that operation in the OT among unknown faces and unexpected circumstances, was a big consolation. The result, a healthy baby in my arms.I just want to take this opportunity to extend a big Thank You to Dr Sharma for being there not at as a medical practitioner alone but as a support, a doctor with a human touch that is difficult to find in today's time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Seema mam is very friendly. She explains the issue and provides best treatment and always focuses on providing vitamins. Best thing about her is she doesn't write unnecessary tests and medicines. She always encourages and motivates her patients with a beautiful smile. I visited her first time in March 2022 for infertility treatment and she detected that I have endometriosis. She started my treatment and I got pregnant in July 2022 and throughout my pregnancy she guided me very well. I would recommend Seema mam to everyone. By God's grace and Seema Mam's treatment I am blessed with a baby boy in March 2023. I had complications in my pregnancy but she handled and advised the **** treatment. I m really thankful to you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Seema has been one of my few doctors available who are polite and understanding. She listens to you and interacts with you on both professional and personal levels. She explains everything with such a content and calm which makes the first time to-be parents like us feel secure. Her knowledge is remarkable and she breaks so many myths which are there pertaining to the pregnancy. She encourages natural way of consumption of vitamins and nutritions rather than sticking to artificial supplements. Dr. Seema is the best thing that has happened to us in our pregnancy journey.

I have been visiting Dr Seema sine 2015 for various concerns like vaginal problems, female related issues and recently for Bartholin Cyst. When it comes to my body, I don‚Äôt trust anyone else apart from Seema mam. 

Dr - As a doctor, she is highly educated with lots of certifications and other courses. She has traveled through countries too for sharing her knowledge with the patients and students.

Staff - Staff is evergreen busy yet helpful.

Clinic - Well maintained with blood tests counter, check up room, medicine shop and washroom. Visit her clinic and you will realise what she means to her patients! 

Thank you for always listening to my problems!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We are truly grateful to Dr Sharma for her guidance throughout our pregnancy. She has always answered all our concerns patiently during our appointments, as we‚Äôre first time parents.
Her calmness and determination helped us deliver our baby healthy and safe, even when we contracted Covid during the second wave of pandemic . She always has been available during our critical period and acted with urgency when it was needed. A very big thank you to her!! 
Also, the staff at the clinic is friendly and helpful, it‚Äôs easy to contact the clinic for any queries/concerns.
reply_text: Thank you so much dear Anshica and Sandeep.. wishing you all lots of love and happiness

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Being treated as ‚Äúsweety Pie‚Äù from a Doctor is the big thing. I hardly remember a day of my visit when she had not cal me with this name and the way she made me comfortable in every moment of my pregnancy. I like the way she explains each and evry condition in a way that you don‚Äônt feel like ‚Äúnot asking the questions‚Äù. I had ample of questions and she had simplest solutions to it. The most calm Doctor I have come across. And Thank you Ma‚Äôam for making it on 31.03.2021 ü§£
reply_text: Lots and lots of love and blessings to you.

I would highly recommend Dr seema ma'am to everyone. I am visiting her for my second baby now and my first baby was also delivered under her guidance. She is highly advanced doctor with correct diagnosis of the problem. 
Best thing about her is she never misguides and never ask you to go for unnecessary tests and medicines.
She always encourages and motivates patients with her beautiful smile.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Bad experience! Went to her with my wife purely looking at the reviews as we were searching for a good Gynae a* *** ******** ********** **** * ****** **** *** *** *** ***** *** ** **** ***** ****** ******* *** ** ** *************
Went there yesterday and she seemed so much in rush. It was our first interaction and thought she would be considerate to all our queries, which were not many bdw, but she only answered the first few questions properly, rest all she dodged which made us sense as if she has to rush and wrap up her queue of patients. And the consultation fees was no less either, so the least we expected was good 15-20 mins of qualitative conversation with her. Not recommending her to anyone, and not going to any doctor just by looking at reviews.
reply_text:
Mr Nagpal,
Thank you so much for reviewing us. We feel sorry that you have not yet found a doctor of your choice and had to poorly review all of them. We called you to tell you our reasons for a seemingly rush situation and you seemed to agree. Subsequently we have called you many times to help you with any queries that you may have but you seem a very busy person yourself and have not bothered to reply. Though we have done everything possible to help you out please let us know if we can be of any more assistance to you and your family. Wishing you all the very best for your future 
Warm regards 
Dr Seema sharma

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I have  had a very pleasant experience with Dr. Seema Sharma since 12-14 months .The doctor is experienced, professional, direct and welcoming. We always felt that we could trust her, and because of her ever-present smile, we always felt at ease interacting with her. I first visited Dr. Sharma when i was pregnant for third time after  two missed abortions . The doctor was so professional and explained how to carefully proceed with this pregnancy basis my previous history. I had followed each of her instructions carefully and after eights months , I had a beautiful baby girl in my arms. We are grateful to her for this angel. Even when i was admitted for observation in apollo cradle, she made sure that I am at great ease and proceed with normal delivery considering I already had 2 abortions and labour pain was unbearable. I 100 percent recommend her services for other parents-to-be and couples facing issues in conceiving or female health related issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I and my wife have had a very pleasant experience with Dr. Seema Sharma. The doctor is experienced, professional, direct, warm, and welcoming. We always felt that we could trust her, and because of her ever-present smile, we always felt at ease interacting with her. We first visited Dr. Sharma when we found out the pregancy of my wife, and eight months later, we had our baby boy under her care. Even though she always asked us to be open to the idea of a caesarian delivery, my wife eventually had a natural delivery. We are grateful to her for this.I wholeheartedly recommend her services for other parents-to-be.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ******* *** ** * **** **** ******* I was having problems in conceiving a baby, had shown it to many doctors earlier but all the doctors used to do high-cost tests and told me many problems.

**** ** ******* **** ** *** ***** ****** ******* ** *********** ****** ***** *** *** ********* ******

And after 2 months I had conceived with IUI treatment at a very low cost.

I also took a 9th-month pregnancy treatment from the Seema mam clinic.

Really Seema mam treated me at a very low cost. 
Dr. Seema Mam‚Äôs behavior is very good like Mom‚Äôs, nice nature & treats patients like her baby. 

She directly catches the root cause of the disease without unnecessary tests.
Seema Mam is a god in human form and a doctor.

In my second pregnancy also, again I took 9 months of treatment from Dr. Seema mam
 and then again I had a lovely son.

I am from a poor family, I try to balance my family by doing the job.

Didn't think that seema mam can give such good treatment at such a low cost

I see my mother in Dr. Seema mam.

thanks, mam

Today my family is complete because of you.

May you always be happy and keep progressing like this.
With Best Regards 
Usha Gupta

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I visited the doctor for chronic Yeast infection and pelvic pain floor ( after seeing her youtube video)  the doctor behaved arrogantly, given the fact that I have prolonged issue, I was obviously worried with tonnes of questions in my mind but she replied so rudely that I barely felt like asking about anything further . I had to force her to do a physical check up something that other gynae do without saying. doctor gave me no meds for my ongoing infection infact seems least intrested in addressing the issue. she only focused on the pain part ** **** *** *** **** *** ****** ***** ***** ********* ******** **** ** ** ***** ****** ( she didn't even explain us about the procedure). the doctor seemed in hurry and told they are about to shut though I visited clinic as per practo timings (7pm).my consultation did not last more than 12-15 minutes ( this was my first consultation with her ). and inspite of paying 1000 rs for consultation she asked us to pay 250/- extra for "extra time" . like seriously! we of course took a stand and didn't pay the most . as this is the least amount of time any doctor charging this much should be giving their patients. now I am at a loss. I have no solution to my infection or no explanation for my pain.more than money I regret my time being wa s t ed and delay in treatment *** ** *********** will have to see another doctor now. I won't recommend this Doctor anyone!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

She listened to me properly, my problems. However, it feels like jo solution provided. She just asked me to have one test and no lab will do without prescription. 
***** *** ** *** ** ******* ** ****** I had to visit doc to take advice and prescription.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Would never recommend this doctor ever.
I had doubts about my pregnancy conceiving beginning phase.
First test came negative. Then, she got my blood tests done twice in around a week time. The reports came positive. Then, she asked me to get ultrasound done too after another week. ******** ** ****** ** ** * **** ***** * ***** **** * ******* * ********* ** ******* ******** *** * ***** ***** **** ** ***** **** ****** I would never ever visit the clinic and the doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am quite satisfied and happy with getting treatment from Dr. Seema Sharma..Her smiling face and positive attitude gives good vibes to patients.. she doesn't prescribe unnecessary medicines which is very good..She is a good listener and always answers my queries.. :)

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I decided to visit Dr. Seema for my health issues after reading positive reviews here.

Here's what I didn't like:

1) The doctor suggested that I avail services like blood test, etc at her clinic. 

2) She was getting impatient when I was asking many questions and wasn't ready to lend an ear

3) I forgot to ask her a question and asked the recepcionist to let me in again for a second. The recepcionist suggested that I tell her my concern and she will get back to me with the doctor's response. It never happened, even though I followed up

4) Upon reaching, the staff asked me what my health concern was. It made me uncomfortable. She wasn't the doctor, so I don't understand how that was necessary. It violated my privacy. 

Overall, my experience was a disappointing one. *** ***** ** * **** ******* *** I didn't have that experience. I wish I had a better one.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I was in my last month of pregnancy when I started visiting Dr Seema as she was recommended by our family Dr and it was our luck that we found her. *** ** *** ** *** ****** ************ ** **** **** **** ***** She is always on time (except in case of an OT emergency which ofcourse she is supposed to give preference to) as we experienced no wait time at all at her. However the best thing about her is the personal touch which most of Doctors miss these days. She was always available to answer our queries and directly through her cellphone (whatsapp /call) and even responded when she was abroad and traveling. We rushed to Apollo due to emergency and she was there before we reached there. We can't thank her enough for delivering our baby safely and always being there. God bless üôè
reply_text: Thank u my dearüôè
